pro.title: Upgrade to Pro
pro.subtitle: Get access to advanced features and take your AI tool discovery to the next level

cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access to Pro features until the end of your billing period.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and wire transfers for Enterprise plans.

refund.question: Do you offer refunds?
refund.answer: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all Pro subscriptions. No questions asked.

enterprise.question: What's included in the Enterprise plan?
enterprise.answer: Enterprise plans include custom features, dedicated support, and special integrations tailored to your needs.

Footer.description: Find and share the best AI tools and resources in the world, helping designers and developers improve their creative efficiency.

Hero.title: Discover the world's
Hero.subtitle: Explore tools from the most talented and accomplished AI creators
Hero.subtitleSecondLine: ready to take on your next project

SubmitForm.title: Submit Your AI Tool
SubmitForm.description: Share your AI tool with our community. We showcase the best AI tools to help creators and businesses discover new resources.

placeholders.name: Enter the name of your AI tool
placeholders.description: Describe what your tool does, its key features, and why it's valuable

tips.description: A clear, concise description helps users understand what your tool does.
tips.email: We'll use this to contact you about your submission and notify you when it's live.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.imageRequired: Please upload a screenshot of your tool
errors.submitFailed: Something went wrong. Please try again.

success.title: Submission Received!
success.message: Thank you for submitting your AI tool. We'll review it and add it to our directory soon.
